pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package provides an EDSL for calling JavaScript code using the JavaScriptCore engine and low level Haskell bindings in the webkit-javascriptcore library <https://github.com/ghcjs/webkit-javascriptcore>.

use.flag: Include HasCallStack constraint on calls unchecked calls
Fail unchecked calls when they are called (rather than when the result is evaluated)
